title: The Shawshank Redemption
extract: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
extract: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
extract: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Inception
extract: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology.

title: Pulp Fiction
extract: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine.

title: Schindler's List
extract: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
extract: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam.

title: Forrest Gump
extract: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man.

title: Fight Club
extract: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care shoemaker form an underground fight club.

title: Interstellar
extract: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
